name: Yume no Kirby
description:
Kirby may live in Dreamland, but never in these 30 years have we explored his own dream land. What hides in this world unseen? And what haunts him at night? 

This is a tribute to the Kirby series for its 30th anniversary, as well as an entry for Entry for Dream Diary Jam  6. This is a demo - and my first attempt at a game! There will be more updates to come, so look forward to it. 

Special thanks to Dinoburger (dinoburger on tumblr) and Hamm Slamm (@hamm_slamm on Twitter) for helping compose the covers included in the game.
